description:
The official app for Globe Soccer Awards.
Celebrities and prestigious nominees from the football world will once again attend the yearly event.

Also, don’t forget to tune in for the streaming video, live from the Awards gala.

The official app allows to:
- Vote for your favourite football stars
- Predict scores from the major leagues
- Keep track of the nominees and winners
- Get directions to the Event venue
- Explore the photo gallery and previous editions' Awards

Be the 1st to Know! 365Scores helps you become an EXPERT OF THE GAME with Live Scores, Pre-Game Stats and Predictions, In-Depth Data, News Updates, Upcoming Fixtures, Lineups - and everything else you need to stay connected to your favorite players, teams, and competitions.

Join over 150 million sports fans who rely on 365Scores for real-time updates, pre-game stats and in-depth insights.

* EXTENSIVE SPORTS COVERAGE
Follow the UEFA Champions League, English Premier League, LaLiga, NBA, Wimbledon, and 2000+ competitions in 10 different types of sports, including top football, basketball, tennis events and much more – all in one live scores app.

* LIVE FOOTBALL RESULTS
Get all the latest football news and updates, right at your fingertips! Football scores from your favorite football teams, such as Real Madrid, Manchester City, Liverpool and much more!

* EXCLUSIVE iOS FEATURES
365Scores offers two powerful iOS widgets to keep you closer to the game than ever:
Home Screen Widget – Instantly view your personalized My Scores list with live and upcoming games — right on your home screen. Perfect for quick updates and easy access to the matches you care about.
Live Activities – View real-time scores directly on your home screen, even when your phone is locked.

* TEAM NEWS & STATS
No matter which team you support, 365Scores delivers everything you need: live scores, sports news, squad updates, real-time stats, league tables, transfer updates, and social media buzz.

* PRE-GAME STATS & PREDICTIONS
Get a competitive edge with our comprehensive pre-game stats, including head-to-head records, recent form, key player analysis, and expert insights. These data-driven predictions help you to prepare for each game. Stay ahead of the game with 365Scores!

* CUSTOM SPORTS SCOREBOARD
Choose your favorite teams and leagues to follow, or pick matches instantly.
Get real-time football updates whenever you need them.

* INSTANT MATCH NOTIFICATIONS
Stay updated with instant match alerts! Follow every play with our Live Match Tracker, even when you can’t watch live
Warning! Our live match notifications may be faster than your match stream!

* LIVE SPORTS CALENDAR
Check our ALL SCORES tab, the most updated multi-sport calendar that you can find.
365Scores delivers full coverage of 9 sports: Football, Basketball, Tennis, American Football, Baseball, Handball, Ice Hockey, Rugby and Volleyball - with more than 2,000 competitions, including: UEFA Champions League, English Premier League, Spanish LaLiga, German Bundesliga, Italian Serie A, AFC Champions League, NBA, NFL, NHL, MLB, Wimbledon and much more!

Be an expert of the game with 365Scores – download now and never miss a moment!

We’re always happy for any feedback! 
Email: contact@365scores.com
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/365Scores
Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/365scores
Follow us on X:  https://x.com/365scores

Terms of use: https://365scores.info/pages/terms
Privacy Policy: https://365scores.info/pages/privacy

Step into the thrilling world of +75 sports like never before with the Team Saudi App—your ultimate ticket to all things sports in the Kingdom! Whether you're cheering from the stands or have aspirations to become Elite Athlete; you are parent, coach, student or a teacher… each and every one of us is proud Team Saudi! No point of waiting join the Team now!

We are launching this app in multiple phases…


Phase 1 Highlights:

- Breaking News & Exclusive Stories: Be the first to know what’s happening with your favorite athletes and teams.
- Meet the Athletes: Explore +500 inspiring athlete profiles, from rising stars to professional heroes, and get to know their journeys!
- Can’t-Miss Events: Stay ahead of the game with the hottest sports events happening all across Saudi Arabia.
- Instant Rewards: Get exclusive discounts and perks with our loyalty partners just by being a member of the app!
- Become an Athlete: Got big dreams? Follow our sport pathways and connect with relevant sports federations and take the first step towards making your dreams come true!

And That’s Just the Start!

Get ready for even more excitement coming your way! Soon, you'll be able to:

- Shop Exclusive Team Saudi Merchandize straight from the app with speedy delivery right to your door.
- Level Up with Gamified Rewards: Earn points, climb tiers, and unlock epic rewards for being part of the Team Saudi community!
- Compete in National Challenges: Sync your health data and join action-packed challenges, with leaderboards, prizes, and bragging rights up for grabs!

It’s time to take your passion for Saudi sports to the next level—download the Team Saudi App now, and become a part of Team Saudi today!

developer: Mackolik Internet Hizmetleri Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
description:
Transform your football experience with M Scores - trusted by 10M+ fans for lightning-fast updates, live scores and deep match insights for Premier League, LaLiga, Champions League and 1000+ leagues worldwide 

Get team line-ups, live football scores, match results, fixtures, ratings, team and player statistics from thousands of leagues and tournaments in football, basketball, volleyball, tennis, and F1 for free.

The fastest notifications for football live scores! Premier League, LaLiga, UEFA Champions League and more competitions. Get instant goal alerts, match predictions & live stats.

FAST NOTIFICATIONS AND RELIABLE FOOTBALL LIVE SCORES
Get the latest news from games as the ball crosses the line. Reminder alerts for pre-match, kick-off, half-time and full-time results will come to your mobile with instant push notifications. 

SEE WHAT’S RELEVANT TO YOU FIRST
With M Scores, we prioritize your local leagues so that you can see what’s relevant to you first and foremost.

For example: If the user is in the UK, local leagues and tournaments in the United Kingdom, such as the Premier League, will take priority and will be shown first.

PICK YOUR FAVORITE FOOTBALL TEAMS AND PLAYERS
With M Scores you can closely follow your favourite teams and their matches. Get notified about the goals, red cards, half-time, and full-time scores instantly. 

You can also choose your favourite football players and get notifications about them. If your favourite players are in starting line-ups for their respective games, or they score goals, have assists, sub-in or sub-out, we will notify you instantly. 

DETAILED FOOTBALL STATS, FORMATIONS AND LIVE TABLES
Easily access to detailed pre-match, football live score, and post-match statistics.

View formations of the football teams in many important leagues and tournaments such as Premier League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, FIFA World Cup, UEFA European Championship, UEFA Nations League.

Through ‘Live Table’, follow positions of football teams in their respective leagues and tournaments as scores change simultaneously. Will your favourite football team be able to win the Premier League this season?

TEAM COMPARISONS
View and compare several football stats such as recent meetings between opponents, their form, their home and away results.

PLAYER PROFILE PAGES
With our informative player pages, - take a look at players’ careers and get to know them better.

LIVE COMMENTARY
Don’t miss the games you are not able to watch. Follow the games in depth with Live Commentary tabs in match pages.

TRANSFER MARKET NEWS & RUMOURS
Follow all football transfer market updates, news, rumours and confirmations.

M SCORES FORUM
Share your excitement for the match on M Scores Forum. You can like and reply to other users' comments. You can also join the forum with your Google or Facebook accounts.

BASKETBALL, VOLLEYBALL, TENNIS, F1
With M Scores, you can get live basketball, volleyball, and tennis scores just as fast as football! Follow the games with our user-friendly interface. 

With F1, you will have the immersive racing experience with our radar and live timing screens.

Download the M Scores app now and don't miss a thing! All the information and news from the world of sport and live football scores at your fingertip.


https://www.mackolik.com/static-gizlilik-politikasi-en.html
https://www.mackolik.com/static-kullanim-kosullari-en.html

Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. With personalized alerts and lightning fast match updates, you'll always stay informed about your favorite teams and players. Our mission is simple: We're changing the way the world follows football.

Key features include:
• Live scores with instant goal notifications
• Personalized news and alerts for your favorite clubs and players
• Home screen widgets with news and live matches
• Detailed match stats, including xG and shot maps
• Video highlights and audio commentary
• Live text commentary to follow the action as it happens
• Transfer updates and breaking news
• TV schedules so you know exactly when and where to watch
• Weekly Team of the Week (TOTW) and player ratings

We cover more than 400 competitions globally, including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, Champions League, Liga MX, FA Women’s Super League, Eredivisie, World Cup 2026, and many more.

Stay connected and share your feedback we'd love to hear from you:

description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

Step into the heart of Saudi football with the official Saudi Pro League (SPL) app, your ultimate companion for live matches, breaking news, player updates, and fantasy football. Designed for fans of the fastest-growing league in the world, the SPL app brings you closer than ever to the excitement of the Roshn Saudi League.

Whether you are looking for live scores, fixtures, standings, transfers, or in-depth match statistics, the SPL app delivers everything in one place. It is more than just a news source — it’s the official hub of Saudi football, built to give fans a complete and interactive experience.


Key Features

• Live Scores & Real-Time Match Updates
Follow every SPL match with instant live scores, detailed fixtures, results, scorers, lineups, and formations. Our real-time notifications ensure you never miss a goal, red card, or match highlight.

• Fixtures, Results & Standings
Track the full season with up-to-date tables, team standings, and historical data. Easily browse past results, upcoming fixtures, and key head-to-head matchups to stay ahead of the competition.

• Match Statistics & Data
Go beyond the scoreline with comprehensive match statistics — from player performances, assists, and substitutions to possession stats, cards, and shots on goal.

• Team Lineups & Player Profiles
Get closer to your favorite clubs and stars. View official team lineups, formations, and player profiles, complete with performance updates and seasonal stats.

• Instant Notifications
Set custom alerts for your favorite teams, matches, and players. Receive push notifications for goals, match kick-offs, transfers, final scores, and breaking news so you’re always in the loop.

• League News & Transfers
Stay updated with official news, analysis, and insights from across the league. Follow transfer updates, player signings, and club announcements — all in real time.

• SPL Fantasy Football
Experience the thrill of managing your dream team with the official SPL Fantasy Game. Pick your squad, make transfers, choose formations, and compete against friends or fans across the world. Climb the leaderboards and showcase your football knowledge with every gameweek.

• Multilingual Experience
The SPL app is designed for all fans, with full support in Arabic and English. Switch easily between languages to enjoy the app in the way that suits you best.

• Broadcasting & Match Coverage
Get details on broadcasting channels, commentators, and coverage options, so you always know how to watch your favorite matches live.

• Season Calendar & Key Dates
Stay on top of every moment with an integrated calendar that highlights season kick-offs, transfer windows, key fixtures, and major events across the Saudi Pro League.

• Accessibility & Ease of Use
Built for every fan, the app includes a clean design, fast navigation, and features like widgets, offline support, and accessibility tools to make following football simple and enjoyable.


Why Choose the SPL App?

The SPL is the official and only app you need for following Saudi football. Unlike other apps that spread their focus across many leagues, our app is built exclusively for the Roshn Saudi League, giving you the fastest, most accurate, and most reliable updates directly from the source.

With the SPL app, you don’t just read about football — you live it. From breaking news to fantasy football thrills, from lineups and stats to fixtures and results, the app ensures you are always one step ahead.

Download Now

Download today and get closer to the action — live scores, news, transfers, statistics, fantasy football, and everything in between — only with the Saudi Pro League Official App.

All in one place: live results, match schedules, league tables, player stats, line-ups, channels, and commentators.

Key Features:

Match schedules for today, tomorrow, and yesterday

Instant goal and full-time notifications

Real-time event tracking with live text updates

Coverage of over 1,000 leagues and tournaments worldwide

Follow top competitions such as the World Cup, UEFA Champions League, AFC Asian Cup, Africa Cup of Nations, Copa America, and CAF/AFC Champions League — all updated live.

Track your favorite national teams — Saudi Arabia, Egypt, Morocco, Algeria, Iraq, Argentina, Portugal, and more — with full stats and match details.

Dot Score gives you a unique sports experience, delivering real-time match updates
without any video streaming — just fast, accurate, live results from every match.

Watch out! You are blocked by the other cars, it's time to leave. Guide your car to leave the parking lot safely. Be careful, keep off the other cars!

There are many obstacles in the narrow parking lot. You need to avoid all the obstacles and leave the parking lot in the correct order. Can you get through these difficulties?

Features: 
Classic level gameplay: solve various puzzles one by one, get various rewards after clearing.
Challenge mode: including simple challenges and difficult challenges. The higher the difficulty, the more rewards.
Sign-in system: obtain coin rewards everyday.
Multiple skinning: various types of cars, different scenes, even car exhaust and NPC obstacles have different designs.

What are you waiting for? Challenge your brain with this tricky game now!

Experience SPORTS and Entertainment Anywhere, Anytime!
 
Stream on tablets and mobile devices wherever you are and dive into a world of high-quality live streaming that includes:
• Top global sports tournaments on beIN SPORTS channels.
• Blockbuster movies and trending series for unforgettable moments.
• Kids' channels to keep the little ones entertained.
 
A unique and all-inclusive experience that includes:
▪ High Quality Premium Channels, including 4K Channel.
▪ High speed streaming with low Latency (as less as 15 seconds latency from satellite service).
▪ Personalized Reminders and Push Notifications service to keep you updated on the latest matches.

This service is exclusively available for users in the Middle East and North Africa region.

كل ما تحتاجه في عالم FC في تطبيق واحد.
تكتيكات جاهزة، مهارات، أخبار، تحديات، ودردشة مع لاعبين آخرين. فوت زون، مكان عشاق الفوت.

المميزات

التكتيكات الجاهزة مع الأكواد
قائمة محدثة باستمرار لتكتيكات فعالة تناسب مختلف أساليب اللعب والعمق الدفاعي والهجومي. انسخ الكود مباشرة وطبق الخطة فورا داخل اللعبة.

حلول تحديات SBC
وفر وقتك وعملاتك، كل يوم حلول محدثة وسهلة لتحديات SBC الجديدة.

قسم المهارات
خطوات واضحة لتعلم حركات ومهارات اللاعبين، من المبتدئين إلى المحترفين.

الأخبار
تابع آخر التحديثات والفعاليات من عالم FC أولا بأول.

مراجعات اللاعبين
شاهد تقييمات وآراء اللاعبين قبل أن تضم أي نجم إلى تشكيلتك.

حاسبة الضريبة
احسب الضريبة بدقة على كل عملية بيع أو شراء داخل السوق.

المنتدى والدردشة
تفاعل مع مجتمع لاعبين آخرين مثلك، ناقش التكتيكات، شارك أفكارك، وتعرف على لاعبين جدد من كل مكان.

الاستطلاعات
شارك في تصويتات أسبوعية حول اللعبة وكن جزءا من قرارات المجتمع.

لماذا فوت زون؟
لأنك لا تحتاج أكثر من تطبيق واحد لعالم FC.
فوت زون يجمع كل ما يهمك، من التكتيك إلى التفاعل الاجتماعي، في تصميم بسيط ومريح لعشاق الفوت الحقيقيين.

حمل التطبيق الآن وابدأ التجربة!

Join Malaeb and immerse yourself in the world of sports like never before. Whether you're a passionate athlete or a sports enthusiast, this app is your gateway to connect, compete, and celebrate the spirit of sports with like-minded individuals.

Discover a World of Sports:
Explore a wide range of sports activities available in your area. From football and basketball to tennis and Padel, Malaeb offers a diverse selection of sports for you to choose from. Find the perfect match, join teams, and challenge yourself to new sporting experiences.

Connect and Compete:
Connect with fellow sports enthusiasts, form teams, and organize matches effortlessly. Malaeb brings together players of all skill levels, making it easy to find the right match for your competitive spirit. Get ready to showcase your skills, improve your game, and forge lasting friendships within the vibrant Malaeb community.

Book and Manage:
With Malaeb, booking sports facilities has never been simpler. Browse through a comprehensive list of available venues, check availability, and secure your preferred slot with just a few taps. Stay organized with real-time notifications, manage your bookings seamlessly, and focus on what you love most—playing sports.

Stay Updated:
Never miss out on exciting sports events, tournaments, or leagues happening around you. Malaeb keeps you informed about the latest sports news, updates, and upcoming events, ensuring you're always in the loop. Be a part of the action, cheer for your favorite teams, and celebrate the victories of your sporting community.

Enhance Your Sports Journey:
Track your progress, analyze your performance, and set new goals with Malaeb's personalized features. Monitor your statistics, record your achievements, and receive valuable insights to elevate your sports journey. Whether you're a casual player or a seasoned athlete, Malaeb empowers you to reach your full potential.

Download Malaeb today and unlock a world of sports at your fingertips. Join the thriving sports community, unleash your passion, and experience the joy of playing with Malaeb – where sports come alive.

قولاتو منصة لاعبي كرة القدم، تتيح لك حجز الملاعب، الإشتراك في الأكاديميات، الإنضمام للتمارين. 
سواءً كنت منسق فريقك لحجز الملاعب، أو كنت هاوي وتدور أحد تلعب معه، أو حتى تبغى تتدرب وتتعلم أساسيات وفنون كرة القدم، حيّاك! 
قولاتو منصة متكاملة لعشاق كرة القدم تستعرض منها الملاعب في مدينتك، وممكن تستعرض على الخريطة، وتختار الأقرب لك والأنسب موقع، وتقدر تستعرض الملعب وتشوف خدماته ومميزاته، وتشوف صوره وتحجزه بكل موثوقية وضمان وبضغطة زر بس!

ليه تحجز ملعبك من قولاتو؟ 

قولاتو فيه أكثر من 400 ملعب تقدر تختار بينها، فيه الإنجيلة، والترابي، والطبيعي ، والصالات ، وتخيل عندنا ملاعب فيها مكيفات ! 
الحجز مرن جداً ولو حصل لك أي ظرف أو حتى غيرت رأيك، بسهولة تعدل على حجزك. 
الدفع يكون في الملعب، ما رح تدفع أي شي قبل. 
أفضل العروض والأسعار، بتحصلها معنا.



خدماتنا الرهيبة الإضافية: 
في قولاتو تقدر تسجل أو تسجل إبنك في أفضل الأكاديميات الرياضية في مدينتك، تستعرض الخيارات المتاحة، وش ممكن تقدم لك كل أكاديمية، وتسجل بكل سهولة وبدون رسوم إضافية.
تقدر تحجز لتمرينك وتكمل أي فريق تبغاه. 

وفريقنا جاهز للتواصل معك وإستقبال أي استفسارات وحنا معك على مدار الساعة. 
يسعدنا متابعتك لنا على منصات التواصل الإجتماعي
